cJSON module usage guide

Brief:          This module is the implementation of cJSON parser and generation.
Usage:          GCC: Include the module with "include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/third_party/cjson/module.mk" in your GCC project Makefile.
                KEIL:Drag the middleware/third_party/cjson folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/cjson/inc to include paths.
                IAR: Drag the middleware/third_party/cjson folder to your project. Add middleware/third_party/cjson/inc to include paths.
Dependency:     N/A.
Notice:         N/A.
Relative doc:   Please refer to the Open source user guide under the doc folder for more detail.
Example project:Please find the cjson project under project folder.
